SOEntry.title: SO Program Entry
SOEntry.description: A single ledger entry for the SO Program tracking session progress and financials.

week.description: The week number of the program.

sessionNumber.description: The session identifier (can be a number or 'x' for excused).

paid.description: Whether the session has been paid for.

checkNumber.description: The check number used for payment, if applicable.

ableToPresent.description: Whether the user was able to present during the session.

presentationTopic.description: The topic presented during the session.

notes.description: Clinical or personal notes from the session.

aiInsight.description: AI-generated clinical synthesis of the entry.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the entry was created.

/users/{userId}/so_entries/{entryId}.description: User's personal SO Program ledger entries.
